chat_history.message: Hello, my product iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem: Where is the package? Many thanks for your help,
Hello, My product iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem: The delivery date is constantly being delayed by UPS. Thank you for your help,

Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:
According to UPS, the shipment is lost. I need a phone number from you to report the case to UPS.

Thank you for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customer's ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.
 
Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents.

If at any point the delivery begins to move again, a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Libania - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have updated our logistics partner regarding this issue. In the meantime, please assist the customer in providing a handwritten CND and pictures of the customer's ID.

Regards,
Xt

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. 

Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours, or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Libania - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for the documents. We wil update our logistics partner with these documents. In the meantime, please be patient.

Regards,
Xt

Dear ecomobile

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded €401.04 to the customer for not having complied with our quality charter. 

Regards,
Libania from the Back Care Team
